casebody.data:
AYERS
v.
CLEVELAND 2018-0852 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 29, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Donnell, Kennedy, and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Cause accepted on proposition of law No. I.

French, Fischer, and DeGenaro, JJ., would also accept the cause on proposition of law No. II.
